title: Chairman PTA meets Ambassador Saadia in Norway
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 26 (APP): Chairman PTA, Major General (R) Hafeez Ur Rehman, HI (M), held a high-level meeting with Pakistan’s Ambassador to Norway, Saadia Altaf Qazi, during his official visit to Norway to represent Pakistan in the Internet Governance Forum (IGF) 2025.
The meeting focused on strengthening bilateral cooperation in the digital domain and exploring strategic avenues to enhance Pakistan’s global digital footprint, said a news release.
During the meeting, Chairman PTA briefed the Ambassador on Pakistan’s progressive digital regulatory landscape, highlighting PTA’s strategic focus on fostering digital inclusion, broadband penetration, and cybersecurity readiness in line with international best practices. The Ambassador appreciated PTA’s proactive role in promoting inclusive and secure digital transformation, and assured full support in fostering international engagements that reinforce Pakistan’s vision for a connected, empowered Nation.
This engagement reflects PTA’s proactive approach in strengthening international partnerships to support its vision of a secure, inclusive, and future-ready digital Pakistan.
